Package org.dlw.ai.blackboard

Package containing objects that orchestrate this application problem set.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Blackboard This class is where the problem is addressed and solved.
BlackboardContext This singleton class can be used by any class to obtain the blackboard and controller instances.
BlackboardContextTest  
BlackboardTest  
Brain This class manages the collection of KnowledgeSource type instances.
BrainTest  
Controller The Controller class is used to orchestrate (state machine controller) the problem solving that occurs at the blackboard.
Cryptographer The Cryptographer class represents the host of the blackboard problem.
CryptographerTest  
Main The Blackboard project is an example of an Artificial Intelligence model that was created by Grady Booch in his book Object Oriented Design and Analysis.
 

Enum Summary
ControllerState This class is used to provide named enumerations for controller states.
 

Package org.dlw.ai.blackboard Description

Package containing objects that orchestrate this application problem set. This package represents a default implementation of the blackboard framework.

Since:
1.0
